summary: Political science is a field of study that examines politics and government. It explores how societies make decisions and create rules. This includes looking at different political systems, such as democracies and dictatorships, and how power is distributed. Political scientists analyze political behaviors, ideas, and the laws that shape our world. They study everything from local community decisions to international relations between countries. It's a way to understand the complex world of politics and how it impacts our daily lives.
title: Political science
